entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
